about_the_game:
The pink-haired internet sensation, bridges the world of anime and gaming. This geek goddess adores plushy toys and cherishes every chat with her followers. Though shy, she's on a bold journey to break free from her cocoon. Ready to join her adventure?

This DLC contains:
- three new levels to beat
- three new photos to hack.

content_descriptors.notes: Occasional nudity, Veiled nudity, General Mature Content
